TopicTitle: KSP crashes on startup (fresh extracted zip)

Articles.Content:
Heya,

after experiencing a problem in my modded install (I just changed some config-values of ActiveStruts) resulting in the game not being launch-able (it crashes immediately), I tried setting a new game up to add my mods back into it.

Buuuut... Even the fresh install (really, just extracted the ZIP) does crash immediately.

Crash Report: https://mega.co.nz/#!u4sF3boK!2-8nhNtMsExZ_GFMyWukPVvoQiKSa6_pwcnfu4R2dgg
